widget.name: React Drag And Drop
widget.description: A drag and drop widget for reordering items with support for tracking changes

property.caption: Items
property.description: List of items to display and reorder

property.caption: UUID Attribute
property.description: Attribute containing the unique identifier for each item

property.caption: Sorting Attribute
property.description: Optional integer attribute to read the sort order (read-only in widget, updated by onDrop action). If provided, same-list reordering will trigger the onDrop action. Leave empty if only cross-list moves should trigger onDrop.

property.caption: Content
property.description: Content to display for each item

property.caption: Empty List Content
property.description: Custom content to display when the list is empty. If not provided, displays "No items to display".

property.caption: Change JSON Attribute
property.description: Context attribute to store changes as JSON

property.caption: Change JSON Mode
property.description: Controls what items are included in the change JSON. 'Full Change' includes all affected items (dragged + re-indexed). 'Target Only' includes only the items that were actually dragged.

property.caption: JSON Template Reference (Read-Only)
property.description: Reference template showing the structure of changes JSON. Each change includes: uuid (moved item), newIndex (position in target list, null for "on" drops), sourceListId and targetListId (for cross-list detection), dropType ("before", "after", or "on"), and targetItemUuid (only for "on" drops). Backend should re-index source list items not appearing in the changes array.

property.caption: On Drop Action
property.description: Action to perform when items are dropped and reordered

property.caption: List Identifier
property.description: Unique identifier for this list (e.g., 'list1', 'list2'). Required for cross-list dragging between multiple widgets.

property.caption: Allowed Lists
property.description: Comma-separated list IDs that can accept items from this list (e.g., 'list2,list3'). Leave empty to allow drag-and-drop only within this list.

property.caption: Allow Drop On Item
property.description: Allow items to be dropped ON target items (not just before/after). When enabled, the item will be marked with dropType='on' in the changes JSON

property.caption: Drop Option
property.description: Controls the drop behavior. 'Auto' allows dynamic positioning based on cursor position. 'Before', 'On', and 'After' force drops to always use that specific position.

property.caption: Enable Multi-Select
property.description: Allow selecting multiple items by clicking. Selected items can be dragged together.

property.caption: Show Drag Handle
property.description: Show the drag handle icon on each item

property.caption: Hover Highlight Color
property.description: Color to highlight item on hover and multi-select (hex format, e.g., #f5f5f5)

property.caption: Drop Before Color
property.description: Color to highlight when dropping BEFORE an item (hex format, e.g., #e3f2fd)

property.caption: Drop On Color
property.description: Color to highlight when dropping ON an item (hex format, e.g., #c8e6c9)

property.caption: Drop After Color
property.description: Color to highlight when dropping AFTER an item (hex format, e.g., #fff9c4)
